entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Strathmore
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:34 AM MDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -16.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Strathmore 04:00 AM MDT Sunday 12 March 2023

Humidity: 88 %

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Sunday 12 March 2023
